posts.name: Nimesh Neema
posts.cooked:
I am trying to build the Signal iOS project. But I keep running into issues.

My system configuration is as follows:

  1. Trying to build both an Intel and Apple Silicon Mac.

  2. Running up-to-date macOS 15 Sequoia 15.1.1.

  3. Latest version of Xcode (16.1) and Cocoapods (1.16.2) installed.

  4. Latest version of Homebrew and Xcode Command Line Tools setup correctly.

Here’s what I am doing and the errors I am getting:

  1. I followed the instructions in the BUILDING.md document in the repo: Signal-iOS/BUILDING.md at main · signalapp/Signal-iOS · GitHub

  2. I cloned the repo along with submodules by running: git clone --recurse-submodules https://github.com/signalapp/Signal-iOS

  3. Trying to run make dependencies throws the following error:

    downloading webrtc-6723a-ios-release.tar.bz2...
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.0_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/urllib/request.py", line 1319, in do_open
    h.request(req.get_method(), req.selector, req.data, headers,
    ~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
              encode_chunked=req.has_header('Transfer-encoding'))
              ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.0_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/http/client.py", line 1336, in request
    self._send_request(method, url, body, headers, encode_chunked)
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.0_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/http/client.py", line 1382, in _send_request
    self.endheaders(body, encode_chunked=encode_chunked)
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.0_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/http/client.py", line 1331, in endheaders
    self._send_output(message_body, encode_chunked=encode_chunked)
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.0_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/http/client.py", line 1091, in _send_output
    self.send(msg)
    ~~~~~~~~~^^^^^
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.0_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/http/client.py", line 1035, in send
    self.connect()
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~^^
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.0_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/http/client.py", line 1477, in connect
    self.sock = self._context.wrap_socket(self.sock,
                ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^^^^
                                          server_hostname=server_hostname)
                                          ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.0_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/ssl.py", line 455, in wrap_socket
    return self.sslsocket_class._create(
           ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^
        sock=sock,
        ^^^^^^^^^^
    ...<5 lines>...
        session=session
        ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
    )
    ^
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.0_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/ssl.py", line 1076, in _create
    self.do_handshake()
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.0_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/ssl.py", line 1372, in do_handshake
    self._sslobj.do_handshake()
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^
ssl.SSLCertVerificationError: [SSL: CERTIFICATE_VERIFY_FAILED] certificate verify failed: unable to get local issuer certificate (_ssl.c:1020)

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/nimeshneema/Developer/Signal-iOS/Pods/SignalRingRTC/bin/fetch-artifact.py", line 171, in <module>
    main()
    ~~~~^^
  File "/Users/nimeshneema/Developer/Signal-iOS/Pods/SignalRingRTC/bin/fetch-artifact.py", line 157, in main
    open_archive = download_if_needed(archive_file, url, checksum, archive_dir)
  File "/Users/nimeshneema/Developer/Signal-iOS/Pods/SignalRingRTC/bin/fetch-artifact.py", line 116, in download_if_needed
    with urllib.request.urlopen(url) as response:
         ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.0_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/urllib/request.py", line 189, in urlopen
    return opener.open(url, data, timeout)
           ~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.0_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/urllib/request.py", line 489, in open
    response = self._open(req, data)
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.0_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/urllib/request.py", line 506, in _open
    result = self._call_chain(self.handle_open, protocol, protocol +
                              '_open', req)
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.0_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/urllib/request.py", line 466, in _call_chain
    result = func(*args)
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.0_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/urllib/request.py", line 1367, in https_open
    return self.do_open(http.client.HTTPSConnection, req,
           ~~~~~~~~~~~~^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
                        context=self._context)
                        ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.0_1/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.13/lib/python3.13/urllib/request.py", line 1322, in do_open
    raise URLError(err)
urllib.error.URLError: <urlopen error [SSL: CERTIFICATE_VERIFY_FAILED] certificate verify failed: unable to get local issuer certificate (_ssl.c:1020)>
make: *** [fetch-ringrtc] Error 1

  4. Trying to run pod install throws the following error:

    Analyzing dependencies
Downloading dependencies
Generating Pods project
[!] An error occurred while processing the post-install hook of the Podfile.

No such file or directory @ rb_check_realpath_internal - /Users/nimeshneema/Developer/Signal-iOS/Pods/SignalRingRTC/out/release/libringrtc/ringrtc.h

/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-1.16.2/lib/cocoapods/project.rb:326:in `realpath'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-1.16.2/lib/cocoapods/project.rb:326:in `realpath'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-1.16.2/lib/cocoapods/project.rb:326:in `reference_for_path'
/Users/nimeshneema/Developer/Signal-iOS/Podfile:248:in `fix_ringrtc_project_symlink'
/Users/nimeshneema/Developer/Signal-iOS/Podfile:108:in `block (2 levels) in from_ruby'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-core-1.16.2/lib/cocoapods-core/podfile.rb:196:in `post_install!'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-1.16.2/lib/cocoapods/installer.rb:1013:in `run_podfile_post_install_hook'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-1.16.2/lib/cocoapods/installer.rb:1001:in `block in run_podfile_post_install_hooks'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-1.16.2/lib/cocoapods/user_interface.rb:149:in `message'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-1.16.2/lib/cocoapods/installer.rb:1000:in `run_podfile_post_install_hooks'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-1.16.2/lib/cocoapods/installer.rb:337:in `block (2 levels) in create_and_save_projects'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-1.16.2/lib/cocoapods/installer/xcode/pods_project_generator/pods_project_writer.rb:61:in `write!'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-1.16.2/lib/cocoapods/installer.rb:336:in `block in create_and_save_projects'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-1.16.2/lib/cocoapods/user_interface.rb:64:in `section'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-1.16.2/lib/cocoapods/installer.rb:315:in `create_and_save_projects'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-1.16.2/lib/cocoapods/installer.rb:307:in `generate_pods_project'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-1.16.2/lib/cocoapods/installer.rb:183:in `integrate'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-1.16.2/lib/cocoapods/installer.rb:170:in `install!'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-1.16.2/lib/cocoapods/command/install.rb:52:in `run'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/claide-1.1.0/lib/claide/command.rb:334:in `run'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-1.16.2/lib/cocoapods/command.rb:52:in `run'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/gems/cocoapods-1.16.2/bin/pod:55:in `<top (required)>'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/bin/pod:25:in `load'
/Users/nimeshneema/.gem/ruby/3.3.6/bin/pod:25:in `<main>'

I have looked around on the Web and on this forum but to no avail.

Seeking guidance from someone who’s able to successfully build. What is it that I am missing here?
